mapper.sql: UUID, USER_ID, PROJECT_ID, INVEST_ID, REPAY_TIME, REAL_REPAY_TIME, PAYMENT, PAYED_AMOUNT, CAPITAL, INTEREST, STATUS, REPAY_TYPE, PERIOD, PERIODS, LATE_DAYS, LATE_INTEREST, MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST, REPAY_USER_ID, REPAY_TRADE_NO, CREATE_TIME

if.test: page != null and page.sort!=null and page.sort!=''

where.if: and (p.PROJECT_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or u.USER_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or u.real_name like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' )

if.test: page != null and page.sort!=null and page.sort!=''
page == null or page.sort == null or page.sort == ''

mapper.select:
select u.user_name, u.real_name real_name, p.project_name,p.status projectStatus,p.overdue_fee_rate,u.mobile, t.type_name project_type_name, p.project_no,pr.uuid, pr.user_id, pr.project_id, pr.invest_id, pr.repay_time, pr.real_repay_time, pr.payment, pr.payed_amount, pr.capital, pr.interest, pr.status, pr.repay_type, pr.period, pr.periods, pr.late_days, pr.late_interest, pr.repay_user_id, pr.repay_trade_no, pr.create_time,pr.MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST
,( SELECT count(1) from urge_repay_log where repayment_id=pr.uuid) URGE_REPAY_COUNT
from project_repayment pr left join project p on pr.project_id = p.uuid inner join project_type t on p.project_type_id =t.uuid left join users u on pr.user_id = u.uuid
select count(pr.uuid) from project_repayment pr left join project p on pr.project_id = p.uuid left join users u on pr.user_id = u.uuid
select nvl(sum(payment-payed_amount+late_interest+MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST),0) from project_repayment where status = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and repay_time = TRUNC(#{repayTime})
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by repay_time asc) RN, from project_repayment where status = 0 and project_id =#{projectId} and repay_time >= sysdate ) WHERE RN = 1
mapper.update: update project_repayment set status = #{status} where uuid = #{uuid} and status = #{preStatus}
mapper.select: select pr.period,p.time_limit,pr.repay_time,(pr.payment+nvl(pr.late_interest,0)+nvl(pr.MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST,0)) payment,pr.real_repay_time, pr.payed_amount,pr.status,pr.capital,pr.interest,pr.late_interest,pr.late_days,pr.periods,pr.MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST from project_repayment pr, project p where pr.project_id=p.uuid and pr.project_id= #{projectId} order by pr.period asc
select from project_repayment where project_id = #{projectId} and period = #{period} and status = #{status} AND ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: update project_repayment set late_days = #{lateDays},late_interest=#{lateInterest} where uuid = #{uuid}
update project_repayment set repay_type = #{repayType},real_repay_time=sysdate where uuid = #{uuid} and repay_type = #{preRepayType}
mapper.select: select count(uuid) from project_repayment where project_id = #{projectId} and status = #{status}

select u.user_name, u.real_name real_name, p.project_name,p.status projectStatus,u.mobile,t.type_name project_type_name, p.project_no,pr.uuid, pr.user_id, pr.project_id, pr.invest_id, pr.repay_time, pr.real_repay_time, pr.payment, pr.payed_amount, pr.capital, pr.interest, (case when pr.status='0' and p.next_repay_time != pr.repay_time then '-1' else pr.status end) status, pr.repay_type, pr.period, pr.periods, pr.late_days, pr.late_interest, pr.repay_user_id, pr.repay_trade_no, pr.create_time,pr.MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST from project_repayment pr left join project p on pr.project_id = p.uuid inner join project_type t on p.project_type_id =t.uuid left join users u on pr.user_id = u.uuid
and pr.STATUS = #{status} and p.IS_VOUCH = #{isVouch} and p.VOUCH_ID = #{vouchId} and p.BORROW_FLAG = #{borrowFlag} and p.VOUCH_STATUS = #{vouchStatus} and pr.late_Days >0 and p.STATUS != #{projectStatus} and p.PROJECT_NAME like '%'|| #{projectName}||'%' and u.user_name like '%'|| #{userName}||'%' and u.real_name like '%'||#{realName}||'%' and pr.REPAY_TIME >= to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and pr.REPAY_TIME <= to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and pr.repay_type= #{repayType} and pr.repay_type in (2,3)
and (p.PROJECT_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or u.USER_NAME like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' or u.real_name like '%'||#{keywords}||'%' )
order by ${page.sort} ${page.order}
order by p.review_time desc

select pr.uuid, pr.project_id, p.project_name,pr.invest_id,pr.period,p.time_limit,pr.capital,pr.interest,pr.late_interest,pr.MERCHANT_LATE_INTEREST,pr.repay_time,pr.real_repay_time, pr.late_days,pr.repay_type,pr.periods,pr.status from project_repayment pr , project p ,product r where pr.project_id = p.uuid and p.uuid=r.project_id and r.auto_repay='1' and pr.status ='0' and p.realize_flag = '0' and p.borrow_flag= '0' and pr.repay_time < sysdate order by pr.repay_time
select count(uuid) from project_repayment where status= 0 and late_days > 0 and user_id= #{userId}
